remarks: Part 15 of [Baer] p. 50 line 13.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hgmapadd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapadd.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapadd.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
hgmapadd.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapadd.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapadd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
hgmapadd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
hgmapadd $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( G ` X ) .+ ( G ` Y ) ) ) $.
